audio.title: Audio & Sounds
audio.description: Controls all sound effects (Level Up, Notifications, Clicks).

visuals.title: Visual Effects
visuals.levelup_desc: Show full-screen confetti and animations when you gain a level.

language.title: Language / Idioma
language.description: Switch between English and Portuguese for tips and interface elements.

alerts.title: Alerts (Experimental)
alerts.high_price_desc: Notify when rare items appear (Coming Soon).

tips.1: Double-click any trade in the Live Feed to copy a quick message!
tips.2: Use the Smart Search with filters to find the best deals instantly!
tips.3: Complete achievements to unlock exclusive badges and level up faster!
tips.4: Check Market Intelligence for price trends and trading insights!
tips.5: Enable Live Monitor to auto-feed trades - no manual uploads needed!
tips.6: Verify your nick with the @TORTA token for auto-verification!
tips.7: Reach Level 50 'Legendary Whale' by processing 10M+ trades!
tips.8: Smart Alerts highlight underpriced items automatically!
tips.9: Use Charts Engine to visualize price history and market trends!
tips.10: Paid Shouts appear in the ticker - support the community!
tips.11: The pie emoji ðŸ¥§ shows when the ticker completes a full loop!
tips.12: Search debounce prevents lag - type freely without freezing!
tips.13: Customize ticker speed in Settings for your preferred reading pace!
tips.14: Advanced Tools section has manual log upload for historic data!
tips.15: Auto-updater keeps your app fresh - check for updates regularly!

ml_predictor.title: Price Predictor Engine
ml_predictor.subtitle: Advanced statistical inference based on <1>{{count}}</1> records.
ml_predictor.context_tooltip: Configure the item filters to narrow down the dataset for analysis.
ml_predictor.ready_desc: Select an item to analyze historical trends and calculate a fair market value.
ml_predictor.market_activity_desc: Found {{count}} listings with no explicit price.
ml_predictor.market_activity_insight: Insight: This indicates active interest (WTB) or unpriced sellers. Check the trade chat for details.
ml_predictor.no_trades: No trades found for "{{item}}" with material "{{material}}".
ml_predictor.analyzing_desc: Analyzing {{count}} records â€¢ Removing outliers â€¢ Calculating quartiles
ml_predictor.fair_value_tooltip: The estimated 'true' value of the item, calculated as the median of filtered trades after removing extreme outliers.
ml_predictor.confidence_tooltip: Statistical certainty based on sample size and price consistency. Higher is better.
ml_predictor.volatility_tooltip: Standard deviation of prices. High volatility means prices fluctuate wildly.
ml_predictor.buy_zone_tooltip: 25th Percentile: Prices below this are considered a 'Good Deal' for buyers.
ml_predictor.sell_zone_tooltip: 75th Percentile: Prices above this are considered a 'Good Deal' for sellers.
ml_predictor.source_data_tooltip: The actual trade records used to calculate the price. Shows up to 20 most relevant recent trades.
ml_predictor.bulk_tooltip: Analyzes price differences for items sold in batches (e.g., 100x Bricks). Helps identify bulk discounts.

profit_simulator.title: Profit Simulator
profit_simulator.buy_tooltip: The price you pay per unit. Defaults to 20% below Fair Price (simulating a buy order).
profit_simulator.sell_tooltip: The price you sell per unit. Defaults to Fair Market Value.
profit_simulator.qty_tooltip: Simulation volume. Higher volume increases total profit but requires more capital.

service_directory.title: Service Directory
service_directory.title_tooltip: Directory based exclusively on recent trade chat advertisements.
service_directory.subtitle: Live directory of service providers based on trade chat activity
service_directory.empty_description: Providers appear automatically when they announce services in trade chat while the monitor is active.

price_forecast.not_enough_data: Not enough data to generate forecast. Load more historical trades.
price_forecast.predictions_disclaimer: Predictions are based on statistical analysis of historical data. They do not guarantee future results. Use as reference, not absolute certainty.
